name: TEST MY SHMUP PLZ
description:
W-A-S-D to move

K to shoot

Your bullets are always directed towards the sun, making movement your primary obstacle. Move behind the aliens to shoot them. Don't get hit by the asteroids, or you'll stop moving. If an alien reaches the sun, the sun will get bigger. Touching the sun will kill you. Touching the aliens also kills you. Try to rack up a high score.

If you Finish a Few Rounds, please answer the following questions in a comment. I'd really appreciate it.

What was your high score?

Did you enjoy the game?

Were the controls easy to understand?

Would you like the game to be easier or harder?

What other Shmups have you played, and are you a fan of the genre?

And any other thoughts you may have had will all be SUPER HELPFUL.

Thank you!
